headline.main: VICHY FIXES BUDGET FOR NEXT 4 MONTHS; 40,000,000,000-Franc Total Includes 6,202,000,000 for the Defense Services WAR COST IS DUPLICATED Special Fund for Occupation Army Keeps Expenditure at 1,000,000,000 Francs a Day

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Jan. 1 -- In lieu of an annual budget, which is impossible to estimate by reason of the disruption of French finances and related services as a result of the war, the government today published a provisional budget for the first four months of 1941.
